s.text: No, he writes, they went overtly nuclear to achieve status . And when poor self-esteem is the root problem, conventional medicine doesn't work.
The LAT says that this might keep Starr from questioning White House lawyer Bruce Lindsey and Secret Service officers until "well into next year."
